external_games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Mystery of Solarus XD

name: The Legend of Zelda: Mystery of Solarus XD
storyline:
As in many Legend of Zelda games, your adventure begins by Link waking up. Though today, Link wakes up with no memory of what happened the previous night. It seems like he has drunk too much: he has lost his sword, his shield, and more important: he has lost track of Princess Zelda! Where is she? What happened to her? Was she present the previous night too?

And so begins your journey… or, to be more precise, your epic hangover.
summary: Link lost everything: memory, her equipment, and even worse, Princess Zelda. It's up to you to help him overcome this terrible ordeal! It is a complete game, which will make you laugh (hopefully) from beginning to end. It has two gigantic dungeons and its lifespan is estimated to be between 5 and 10 hours. Fortunately, the Forcetri is with you!
